input.sentences: signing a poster for a pledge .
having some ice cream at the fair .
a program put on by the students .
output.sentences: Everyone was lined up at the information booth.
They were singing in line was each person before the next was singing the poster containing a pledge to not drink and drive.
Next there was a line for ice at the fair, Shelly was putting cream over hers for a frapee.
The students who organized the program taught us their new cheers.
The last event of the day, my daughter Hannah introduced a guest speaker who gave a fantastic presentation.
